title: Best Buy has a 70-inch 4K smart TV on sale for just $549.99 ahead of Black Friday
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score a cheap TV deal at Best Buy today
article: If you're looking to score a cheap TV deal ahead of the upcoming Black Friday deals event, then you're in luck.
